```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}

bmi_cols <- c("BMXHT","BMXWT")
df_htwt <- df_full[bmi_cols]

# Metric Calculation done by weight (kg) / (height (m))^2 
df_bmi <- data.frame(df_htwt$BMXWT/(df_htwt$BMXHT/100)^2)
colnames(df_bmi) <- "bmi"
ggplot(df_bmi, mapping=aes(x=bmi)) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth=1,center=0.5) +
  geom_vline(xintercept=25,col='green') +
  geom_vline(xintercept=30,col='red') +
  geom_vline(xintercept=18.5,col='blue') +
  ggtitle(label="BMI of Individuals in NHANES Survey")
ggsave(filename="bmi_plot.pdf")
```
